sense.name: Look at with a fixed gaze.
sense.commentary: Includes: GLARE AT Syntax Is: NP1[agent[animate]] GLARE (AT NP2[patient])
sense.examples: She glared at the man who tried to make a pass at her. He sat there and glared. I find it hard not to glare at her everytime I see her.

sense.name: Shine intensely, either directly or by reflection.
sense.examples: The moon glared back at itself from the lake's surface. The sun glared down on us. The windows winked and the flight of stone steps glared in the sunlight.
